about_the_game:
"My Body Your Body ～まいにち男女入れ替わり生活！？～" is a novel game where the protagonist and three heroines find themselves under a curse that swaps their bodies. As they navigate everyday activities like changing clothes and bathing, they search for a way to reverse the situation in this gender-swapping story.


The protagonist Taichi, who has no friends, was despairing about forming a group for the field
Saki Matsudo, who couldn't let him be alone, decided to form a group with Taichi.

Mariko Honjo reads alone in the corner of the classroom.
Eri Sasazuka is busy playing around on her by herself.
Saki called out to the other loners like Taichi.

This hodgepodge group of individuals came together for the fieldtrip,
which ended with them breaking a "cursed pot" while fooling around inside the museum...
Taichi goes to apologize to the staff, only to be told there was no such exhibit, and returns home. He reflects on the strange day and falls asleep.

The next day-

"What is going on?!?!"
Taichi's shout turned into Saki's voice and resounded throughout the Matsudo household...

Every day these four people's bodies are randomly swapped by a cursed pot!?
Will this ragtag team be able to safely return to their original bodies...?

content_descriptors.notes: Some scenes in the game include body swapping, mild sexual content, and bathing scenes. Not intended for children or all ages.

short_description: A guy and his 3 female friends have fallen under a curse where they swap bodies every day! Will the day really come when they can return to their original bodies?
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Swedish, Norwegian, Finnish, Bulgarian, Portuguese - Portugal, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Korean
